talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#a82424>Velskud</FONT> from<FONT color=#086171>Silver Dragon's Forcefield</FONT>... Okay, I will be careful with him.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$ Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Got it? You must not be rude, by any means.

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Unexpected Encounter$</html>

$ Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Got it? You must not be rude, by any means.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ack! W-wait!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Where did this vermin come from?

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm not an intruder! Wait!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
How dare a cockroach like you intrude on this place? How dare you!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Ugh, I can't budge! He's too strong. How the heck...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Quiet. How dare you worm your way into the barrier and sully it with your vile breath.
You would be a waste of blade.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Rubinart... That man!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
… What? That energy… It is the same as Rubinart's.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Please, mentioning Rubinart should warm him up to me!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
I think so. I've seen him a few times... Ack!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Urgh! I guess they aren't friends!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I told you to be quiet. I'm sick of worms like you coming here in possession of his energy.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ack, no!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Tsk, you are beginning to bore me. Die.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Iris! It's the light the kid gave me!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
…… What… is this?
(Velskud, who was about to swing his sword, looks down at the soft white light.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>In Merca.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Rubinart's blessing is strangely powerful. You, where did you get this?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Does it make sense to tell this guy about my dream where Mistland is destroyed?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
……
(Velskud sighs with obvious irritation.)
Fine, cockroach. Speak.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes. I will tell you everything.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
(Velskud looks at you with murderous intent.)
Even think about lying and I'll tear you apart, worm.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
(You tell Velskud about your dream in detail.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Ugh, I knew it.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
What do I care about a foolish dream? It matters not if a den of cockroaches collapses. No, it's a good thing if it collapses.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
But it will have an effect on Lagendia too. Saint Haven has completely changed, you know.
And I'm not a cockroach, I'm {user_nick}.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Goddess's dream? The changes in the Goddess's dream are transforming Saint Haven?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
That happened because the Goddess's dream is changing.
There's no way a cockroach's foolish dream could have anything to do with the Goddess's dream.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ah! No! I'm not an enemy!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
That is the case in Lagendia. And my mission is to destroy cockroaches like you and protect the continent.
You must be eliminated.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
(All of a sudden, a whirlwind envelops {user_nick}'s body.)
... Huh? What? What is this?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Tsk, what bad luck you have. It would have been better for you to die by my sword.
You are cursed, cockroach.

$Velskud$
So, you came back to die, worm.

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Wait… Where am I and who is that guy…?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Man in Red Armor${sound:npc_Pether_9444_qu_20.ogg}
Rubinart. Foolish Dragon. You failed to make the correct decision.
You ended up back in this empty, stupid world in the end!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Monolith? Did he say Rubinart?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Man in Red Armor${sound:npc_Pether_9444_qu_21.ogg}
Look! This foolish world that has shaken itself but does not even notice!
I will make my way again to the Gods. I will do whatever I can.
I will destroy this world and create a new one! I will regain my power and open the Monolith again!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Closed door? Umm… Wait a minute, are you <FONT color=#a82424>Ultima</FONT> of the Blue Clan?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Man in Red Armor$
Who are you...? Did you just come here from beyond that closed door?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He looks just like Ultima. That red hair... Isn't that Ultima?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Man in Red Armor$
Ultima? What are you talking about? I'm Feder. You…
(He is startled mid-sentence.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ugh! What the… Why is my body… Why now, of all times?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Man in Red Armor$
No... no matter how many strange things happen in the Monolith, you shouldn't be here.
Who are you?! Who dares to show themselves before Feder with that face?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You… This familiar energy… Red… Dragon?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Feder$
You… This is not Rubinart's energy. Can you feel it? The jewel within me is resonating with you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Ugh, it's the same vortex as before... Am I being swept away again?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Feder$
What is this? This vortex? What by the Goddess is happening?

$Feder$
Halt, I command you!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Tsk, what bad luck you have. It would have been better for you to die by my sword.
You are cursed, cockroach.

$Velskud$
So, you came back to die, worm.

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Where am I this time...? It looks less scary, at least.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren$
What the…? This is Old Saint Haven… Has the city changed again? Or… Have I traveled in time without you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(… He's saying things I can't understand.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren$
Why did this...? Why did she show up? Did she create another spatial realm?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren${sound:npc_as_q3862_05.ogg}
…! You're a Mistlander… Why have you come here? You aren't an enemy are you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
An enemy? Hardly. I'm a victim. I got washed up here.
But forget that, you feel strangely familiar... Are you not a Mistlander?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What? A <FONT color=#a82424>dream within a dream</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren${sound:npc_as_q3862_06.ogg}
Familiar...? That's... I can't tell you.
But... did you get dropped here too? Through the vortex? How odd for a Mistlander entering the Goddess's dream within a dream.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So that's what this is. I was teleported here from the <FONT color=#086171>Silver Dragon's Forcefield</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren$
Yes, this is Old Saint Haven, a city that no longer exists. We are in the Goddess's dream within a dream. The deepest dream of all.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(He seems relieved somehow.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren$
The Silver Dragon's Forcefield? Did you see Velskud…?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
If you're talking about that scary guy wearing silver and black armor, I did. After that, there was a guy in red... He was screaming about becoming a god.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Died? He seemed pretty lively to me. Was that just part of the Goddess's dream too?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren${sound:npc_as_q3862_08.ogg}
Are you saying you met Feder?! He… opposed… the Goddess. But he… died.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Speak so I can understand you. Are you saying Feder came back to life because the Goddess's dream has moved?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren${sound:npc_as_q3862_07.ogg}
What's clear is that the Goddess Lagendia's dream has moved. Feder said this would happen but I never... No, it can't be. That's not supposed to happen!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(You should what the other person has to say for now.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren${sound:npc_as_q3862_09.ogg}
That's why I don't know what is a dream and what is real. But... no, whatever you saw... That's not what happened here in the real world. That's the only solace I can find right now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Tsk, what bad luck you have. It would have been better for you to die by my sword.
You are cursed, cockroach.

$Velskud$
So, you came back to die, worm.

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Assassin Ren$
That's why I don't know what is a dream and what is real. But... no, whatever you saw... That's not what happened here in the real world. That's the only solace I can find right now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A <FONT color=#086171>Lagendian</FONT> adventurer?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali${sound:npc_kal_q3859_05.ogg}{action:Talk}
You… Are you aMistlander? Why would someone from Mistland be here...? You can't be part of the Goddess's dream!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't get me wrong. I'm a victim who was dropped here by that vortex too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
And you even know about me... How the heck did you get here?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Rubinart…)</FONT> Didn't you understand the part about me not being any enemy?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali${sound:npc_kal_q3859_06.ogg}
(Kali looks at you suspiciously, but her expressions gradually softens.)
I sense… Rubinart. His power…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There's no need to apologize. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(She believed me way too easily…)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
… Yes. Forgive me for being suspicious. I have been through a lot… but that doesn't excuse doubting someone at first sight.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is it all because of the Goddess's dream?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
What a mess. First Saint Haven changes, and now we've been dropped in a place like this…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It seems that <FONT color=#a82424>Velskud</FONT> is the only one who knows what is happening other than us.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali${sound:npc_kal_q3859_07.ogg}
Yes, the dream has changed. Since this world is the Goddess's dream, our reality changes as her dream fluctuates. Well... hearing about that is one thing, but this is the first time I've seen it in person.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Sounds like I don't need to get into the details.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
You met Velskud? For him to have let you live means you really must not be an enemy. That's a relief…
(Kali's expression brightens.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That is frightening.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
So this world is the Goddess's dream and she even dragged me into it?
Is your Goddess so strong she can blend the two worlds?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's hard for humans to determine the will of the Goddess.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
I don't know what the Goddess intends either. That… is still not…
(Her face suddenly darkens.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Even our memories are subject to change?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
This place is a dream within a dream… Our memories may slowly erode here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ancients?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali${sound:npc_kal_q3859_08.ogg}
Indeed… Is everything changing by the power of the Goddess? Even the fate of the Ancients...?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Right. The first priority is finding a way out.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali${sound:npc_kal_q3859_09.ogg}
That's too long a story to tell here. Let's find the way out first.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Tsk, what bad luck you have. It would have been better for you to die by my sword.
You are cursed, cockroach.

$Velskud$
So, you came back to die, worm.

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Kali$
(Kali seems to be thinking over something serious.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What the... you told me I was cursed earlier?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You were swept all the way here, cockroach!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I best keep my mouth shut.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
(Velskud casts a frightening glance your way.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Huh? He doesn't seem to have the same murderous intent as before.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Be thankful for the power within you, fool.
Though I wonder whether the one who gave it to you knows what he did...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(… His attitude is completely different.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
(Velskud looks around, then speaks with a softer tone than before.)
Unless you want to spend a thousand years here, grab my hand.
You'll have to keep your wits about you to avoid being swept away.

$Velskud$
You must want to stay here for a thousand years. I won't stop you.

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Tsk, what bad luck you have. It would have been better for you to die by my sword.
You are cursed, cockroach.

$Velskud$
So, you came back to die, worm.

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(This place… is the Silver Dragon's Forcefield…)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Receive Reward)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.
It's true that a huge transformation has occurred, but you don't know why, or how it has affected the rest of the world. Like what Priestess of Darkness Shea said, Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield and find out what's going on.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅱ
journal.contents:
Speak with the Man in Red Armor.
After falling into the cracks created by the distortions in Time and Space, you see the Man in Red Armor right in front of you. Talk to Despot Feder, the Man in Red Armor.

Eye of the Goddess-Feder

※To get to Feder, you have to go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with the Man in Red Armor
journal.todo_msg: Speak with the Man in Red Armor.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅲ
journal.contents:
Speak with Assassin Ren.
You were swept up by another whirlwind. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Assassin Ren

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you have to go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅳ
journal.contents:
Speak with Kali.
You were swept up by another vortex before you could have a proper conversation with Feder. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Kali

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you have to go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅴ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
As you were speaking with the others and beginning to fall into the abyss of despair, Velskud appeared before you. Is he, like Feder, part of the Goddess's dream within a dream that appeared for but an instance? Speak with him and find out.

Old Saint Haven-Velskud

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you have to go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅵ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.

You escaped the Old Saint Haven, the dream within a dream. Velskud is looking your way silently. Talk to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
